result.name: veterinary-medicines-regulations-vmr--enforcement-data
result.notes: Data on individual enforcement cases (e.g. Intelligence, information supplied/gatherered about possible breaches of the Veterinary Medicines Regulations (VMR)).

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Veterinary Medicines Regulations (VMR) - enforcement data

extras.value: Information relating to ongoing investigations cannot be disclosed as it coudl prejudice such investigations. The issue of disclosing further informatio about completed investigations is being discussed with Government lawyers. However, information about improvement and seizure notices that have been served  on individuals and businesses is published already (see below).
